item.text: @#// 'bum cha pa bzhugs so//
@#// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ glegs bam drug pa/ bam po dang po// kau shi ka stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can
rnams lta zhog gi/ kau shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las/ bsam gtan
bzhi la bkod de/ tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du
sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo //
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang / bri
ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ zag pa med pa'i

chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur

to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom

pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ba rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par

'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kau shi ka zag pa pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod

pa'i pha rol tu pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa

nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid

dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa

nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang /

'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang /

smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas

kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am/

rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o//

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim

bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i rigs kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha

rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang

ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad dge ba'i lha rnams yod do//

dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do//
shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha

rnams yod do// pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes 'du shes skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha tu pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu

phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong

pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid yod do//

dor ba pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid

stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams
yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad pa rnams yod do// gzugs pa'i

snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod
do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod

do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do//

lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs

rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// kau shi ka stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'bring po'i

sems can rnams lta zhog gi/ kau shi ka stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las/ bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad pa bzhi dang /

gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa//

bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam/ klag pa dang /

bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir/ gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de

dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro//

lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par

'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon par zhugs

par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kau

shi ka zag pa pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan

gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /

'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi

mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /

rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas

pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin

gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen

po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klog pa dang /

bri ba dang / kha ton tu bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad

rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do//

sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do//

tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//

kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod

do// tshad che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do//
'og gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes 'du shes med

skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa

yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa

nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa

nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do//

dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags
pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad pa rnams yod do// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa

brgyad yod do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do//

gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams

yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam

pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa'

sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// kau shi ka shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag

rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las/ bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/

rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu

'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni

'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ zag pa pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro//

rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to//

'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ba rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang

chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs

rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kau shi ka zag pa pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha tu pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid

dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa

nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid

stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag

bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma

pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi

dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// kau

shi ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang

du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che

zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do//

'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do//

tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do//

chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha

rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha
rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//

tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid

yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong ba nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid

yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid

stong pa nyid yod do// pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag

par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags
pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad pa rnams yod do// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms

par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin

gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu

yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa
rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do//

de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// kau shi ka lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi

bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu
mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo

gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur
ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras

bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ba rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo//

thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu

mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kau shi ka zag pa pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul

khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid

dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /

thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po

pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang

chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo

stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so

yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad pa gzhan dag

kyang rgya cher bstan to// kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de

bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing

mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i

lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do//

tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha

rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad

med che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og
gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes 'du shes

min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha tu pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan

gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don

dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin
stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do//

dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do//
byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad pa rnams yod do// gzugs
pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon
pa pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang

dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir 'ong ba'i
'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan
cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de

bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// kau shi ka nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs
kyi bu mo la las/ bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu
'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu
'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha tu pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau

shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ zag pa pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon par zhugs par gyur

to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po thob par 'gyur ro// phyir 'ong ba'i

'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur
to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kau shi ka zag pa pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/

sbyin pa'i pha tu pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa

dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /

mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /

pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul
gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa

brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / byams pa chen po

dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu

mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de

ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba

rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams

yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams

yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod
do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad che ba'i lha rnams yod do//
'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og gyi lha rnams
yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes 'du shes skye

mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi

pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do//
don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba

pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid

stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do//
stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad pa rnams yod do//
gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang /
smon pa pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so

yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do//

dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do//

phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs

rgyas rnams yod do// kau shi ka byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs

pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan

'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba

dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na// bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ zag pa pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de
dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par to// 'thob bo//
thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa

nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ba rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams

kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//

mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kau shi ka zag pa pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang // bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa

dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen

po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid

dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong

pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i

lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang /
smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa

bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher

bstan to// kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de

bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas/ rgyal rigs che zhing

mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe

ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs

pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge

ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad che ba'i lha rnams yod do//

'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og gyi lha rnams yod do// nam

mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// //

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po gnyis pa// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi

pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do/ phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid

yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba pa stong pa nyid

yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong

pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa

yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad pa rnams yod do// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i

sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma pa dang smon pa pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig

pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa

shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams

yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// kau shi ka byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las/ bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad

pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo //

bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du

'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ zag pa pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go/

'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po/ thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po/ thob par 'gyur ro// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po/ thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom

pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob po/ thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon par zhugs

par gyur to// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kau shi ka/ zag pa pa'i chos de dag kyang

gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /

mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos

po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga

dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par

thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi

dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// kau shi

ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o//

de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las/ chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che

zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed

kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do//

tshad snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i

lha rnams yod do// tshad che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og gyi lha rnams

yod do/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes 'du shes skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa

yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid

yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong

pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa

stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams

yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad pa rnams yod do// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod

do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do//

gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras

bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do//

lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par

rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// kau shi ka/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad pa bzhi dang

gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar

gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam glag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na bsod nams ches mang du

'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go/ 'jug

par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro//

dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa ba rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob bo// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems

dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go/ 'jag par 'gyur ro// bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o//

mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kau shi ka zag pa pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam

gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid

dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan

nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang /

rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i

snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /

'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad pa gzhan dag kyang rgya

cher bstan to// kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du

'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim

bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed

kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med

snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod

do// tshad che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do// mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og gyi lha

rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes med 'du shes // skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//

sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang

stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das

pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po

pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams

yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad pa rnams yod do// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par

thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo

rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu

yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do//

lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs

pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// kau shi ka lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las/ bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs

pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs

pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel

lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon par zhugs par gyur to//

'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po/ thob

par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi thog pa pa rnams kyis/ rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang

chub sems dpa'i skyon par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro/ bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur

ro// kau shi ka zag pa pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das

pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid

stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags

pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa

dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang //

byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos

thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi

lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor

gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do//

tshad dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// gdung ba'i

lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do//

pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes 'du shes skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//

bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do//

'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad

stong pa nyid yod do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams

yod do// yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa

rnams yod do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad pa rnams yod do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo

stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// 'jigs pa rnams yod do// so

so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra

bcom pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa

rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// kau shi ka nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig

rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi/ sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de// tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu

bkod na/ kau shi ka de ci snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis

bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka de bas kyang rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka

de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu

zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po/ thob par 'gyur ro// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob

par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon par zhugs

par gyur to// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kau shi ka zag pa pa'i chos

de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang

nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog

ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid

dang / dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad

pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin

thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen

po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to// kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing klag pa dang / bri ba dang /

kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas/ rgyal rigs che zhing

mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do//

dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi

lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad dge ba'i lha rnams

yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do// tshad che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu

mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams

yod do// 'du shes 'du shes skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// bsam gtan

gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// nang stong pa nyid yod do// phyi stong pa nyid yod do// phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do// chen po stong pa nyid yod do// don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid

yod do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do// dor ba pa stong pa nyid yod do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do//

rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do// pa stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa stong pa nyid yod do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dngos po pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do// yang dag

par spong ba rnams yod do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do// dbang po rnams yod do// stobs rnams yod do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod

do// bsam gtan rnams yod do// tshad pa rnams yod do// gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do// rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do// mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo

stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa yod do// mngon par shes pa rnams yod do// ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do// 'jigs pa rnams yod do//

so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do// snying rje chen po yod do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do// dgra bcom

pa nyid yod do// rang byang chub yod do// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do// rgyun tu zhugs pa rnams yod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do// dgra bcom pa

rnams yod do// rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do// kau shi ka 'og gi

phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad pa bzhi dang / gzugs pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la

rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal

pa/ kau shi ka de bas rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam/ klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir

zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslabs shing / rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug

go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to// 'thob

po// thob par 'gyur ro// dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to// 'thob po// thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po

rnams kyang / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon par zhugs par gyur to// 'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro// bla na pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// mngon

par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kau shi ka zag pa pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /

'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /

rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /

dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar kyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu

dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma pa dang / smon pa pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so

yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher

bstan to// kau shi ka rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing / klag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du

'phel bar shes par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas/ rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do//

khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do// mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do// 'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do// gzhan 'phrul

dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do// snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung snang gi lha rnams yod do// tshad

snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung dge'i lha rnams yod do// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do// dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// chung che'i lha rnams yod do//

tshad che ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do// che ba'i lha rnams yod do// gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do// 'og gyi lha rnams yod do// nam mkha'

mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// 'du shes 'du shes min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do// tshul
